Text: alot of people said this is a great anime im still debating on if i should give it a shot. What are your opinions daman?
i was the same as you, i was like this crap looks bad, gave it a try and it was hilarious, the Dub is amazing.

Daman, do you have a release schedule or do you just upload anime when the blue ray is available?
I think he should make a shedule cause sometiems he gets the anime out like THIS ANIME like 3 months before the release date.

what are you talking about man the person before me said something about a schedule and i agreed? weird ne way it would be awesome. If not o well up to daman as long as he keeps doin what hes doin ill be happy.

there cant be a schedule because you never know how long the Encoding and OCR process is going to take. 
1080p videos usually take around 1hour each 
while 720p are 30mins or so.
o ok cool. So its basically whatever you get in your possesion you upload right away got ya.
